    RandomWords - Class in com.example.miniproyecto1.models
    RandomWords class stores lists of words categorized into different difficulty levels.

    reduceOpportunity() - Method in class com.example.miniproyecto1.models.Game
    Reduces the number of opportunities by 1 and returns whether there are still opportunities left.
    reduceTime() - Method in class com.example.miniproyecto1.models.Game
    Reduces the remaining time by 1 second, if there is time left.
    resetTime() - Method in class com.example.miniproyecto1.models.Game
    Resets the remaining time based on the level, ensuring it doesn't go below 2 seconds.
